languages.text: "В смерти напрасной, Волк полуночный, нет чести и славы. Кровью, которой ты жаждешь, умоется враг уже скоро — клыки и когти готовь".
"There is no glory to be found in a needless death, Wolf of Midnight. The foe will choke on the blood you lust for soon enough. Ready your fangs and your claws."
languages.original_text: "В смерти напрасной, Волк полуночный, нет чести и славы. Кровью, которой ты жаждешь, умоется враг уже скоро — клыки и когти готовь".

traits.locale_text: "There is no glory to be gained in needless death, Wolf of Midnight. The enemy will soon choke on the blood you lust for, ready your fangs and claws."
"There is no glory to be gained in needless death, Wolf of Midnight. The enemy will soon choke on the blood you lust for, ready your fangs and claws."

"There is no glory to be found in a needless death, Wolf of Midnight. The foe will choke on the blood you lust for soon enough. Ready your fangs and your claws."

languages.text: «No hay gloria en una muerte innecesaria, Lobo de la Medianoche. El enemigo pronto se ahogará en la sangre que tanto ansía. Prepare sus colmillos y sus garras».
languages.original_text: "There is no glory to be found in a needless death, Wolf of Midnight. The foe will choke on the blood you lust for soon enough. Ready your fangs and your claws."

traits.locale_text: «No hay gloria en una muerte innecesaria, Lobo de la Medianoche. El enemigo pronto se ahogará en la sangre que tanto ansía. Prepare sus colmillos y sus garras».

languages.text: 「真夜中の狼よ、無駄死に栄光はない。敵はあなたが欲する血で、すぐに息を詰まらせるだろう。牙と爪を整えておくのだ」
languages.original_text: "There is no glory to be found in a needless death, Wolf of Midnight. The foe will choke on the blood you lust for soon enough. Ready your fangs and your claws."

traits.locale_text: 「真夜中の狼よ、無駄死に栄光はない。敵はあなたが欲する血で、すぐに息を詰まらせるだろう。牙と爪を整えておくのだ」

languages.text: “游荡于午夜的巨狼啊，无谓的死亡没有任何荣耀可言。敌人很快就会淹没在你所渴求的鲜血之中，磨砺好你的尖牙利爪吧。”
languages.original_text: "There is no glory to be found in a needless death, Wolf of Midnight. The foe will choke on the blood you lust for soon enough. Ready your fangs and your claws."

traits.locale_text: “游荡于午夜的巨狼啊，无谓的死亡没有任何荣耀可言。敌人很快就会淹没在你所渴求的鲜血之中，磨砺好你的尖牙利爪吧。”

languages.text: "In einem nutzlosen Tod liegt kein Ruhm, Wolf der Mitternacht. Der Feind wird schon bald an dem Blut ersticken, nach dem Ihr giert. Macht Eure Zähne und Klauen bereit."
languages.original_text: "There is no glory to be found in a needless death, Wolf of Midnight. The foe will choke on the blood you lust for soon enough. Ready your fangs and your claws."

traits.locale_text: "In einem nutzlosen Tod liegt kein Ruhm, Wolf der Mitternacht. Der Feind wird schon bald an dem Blut ersticken, nach dem Ihr giert. Macht Eure Zähne und Klauen bereit."

languages.text: « Quelle gloire y a-t-il à mourir inutilement, Loup de Minuit ? L'ennemi s'étouffera bien assez tôt dans le sang que vous convoitez. Contentez-vous d'aiguiser vos griffes et vos crocs. »
languages.original_text: "There is no glory to be found in a needless death, Wolf of Midnight. The foe will choke on the blood you lust for soon enough. Ready your fangs and your claws."

traits.locale_text: « Quelle gloire y a-t-il à mourir inutilement, Loup de Minuit ? L'ennemi s'étouffera bien assez tôt dans le sang que vous convoitez. Contentez-vous d'aiguiser vos griffes et vos crocs. »

languages.text: "Gereksiz yere ölümde şan aramaya yer yoktur Gece Yarısı Kurdu. Düşmanlar, pek yakında arzuladığın şekilde kendi kanlarında boğulacak. Dişlerini ve pençelerini hazırda tut."
languages.original_text: "There is no glory to be found in a needless death, Wolf of Midnight. The foe will choke on the blood you lust for soon enough. Ready your fangs and your claws."
